entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:31 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -40.6°C

Visibility: 0.8 km

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Ice fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 41. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023
